#summary how to leverage CIF within FF
#labels Deprecated

= BEFORE YOU INSTALL =

be sure to have FF clear-cache on exit; there will be sensitive data stored as a result of this plugin, if you don't want it laying around, *CLEAR YOUR CACHE*

= Installation =

how to install the firefox search addon

 # download and install [http://code.google.com/p/collective-intelligence-framework/downloads/list?can=2&q=firefox+toolbar firefox-toolbar]
 # restart firefox
 # open the addons window:
  # On the menu bar, click on the Tools menu and select Add-ons. The Add-ons window will appear.
  # In the Add-ons window, select the Extensions panel or Plugins panel.
 # highlight "CIF-Search" ([https://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/8BkVgvt-kqAQQEQthhv6f-EZyG2SI65uYXmxccFd480?feat=directlink ScreenShot])
 # click "preferences"
 # fill in the host and [Tools_cif_apikeys apikey] with their appropriate values
 # MAKE SURE THERE ARE NO SPACES BEFORE OR AFTER THE VALUES
 # close the preference box (the values will auto-save)
 # close the addon's window
 # search for a [DataTypes data type] in the "Search CIF" search box
